channel.title: Saunby.net
channel.description: I'm Michael Saunby; a member of the recently formed Met Office Informatics Lab. Speaking and outreach things, such as hackathons get a brief note here. Stuff I'm making is more likely to be covered in my blog mike.saunby.net

item.title: 2016 projects
item.description:
January

January 16-17. GloFAS #FloodHack at ECMWF Results at www.globalfloods.eu

February

February 25. CIHT SW Region Annual Conference: Better Informed, Better Connected

March

March 18. Rhino hack at Paignton Zoo

April

April 15. TEDx Exeter

April 22-24. International Space Apps Challenge

April 26-27. Open Innovation Summit, London

May

May 5-7. Mozilla Retreat, Berlin

May 12. Real IT Awards

September

Digital Design Weekend. V&A, London

October

October 8-9. Open Data Science Conference

October 28-30. Mozilla Festival, London

November

November 1-4. The Graphical Web 2016. Met Office, Exeter
